name: Transylvanian Castle 3 - The Queen of Sorcery
name_original: Transylvanian Castle 3 - The Queen of Sorcery
description:
ZX Spectrum 48K

Español Una vez que Van Helsing  hubo acabado con Velnor el Hechicero y tras escapar del castillo, cuando se disponía a tomar su carruaje se encontró con una niña que lo esperaba allí. Ésta, entre sollozos, le explicó que su madre, Alena, había sido raptada y encerrada en una oscura mazmorra y que como sabía de sus hazañas contra las hordas del mal que estaban asolando Transylvania, había decidido buscarlo para pedirle ayuda. En esta nueva aventura, vuelves a encarnar al Van Helsing, pero una vez consigas rescatar a la prisionera,  ésta se unirá a ti y  entonces podrás hacer uso de todas sus habilidades.
Por último, tendréis que escapar juntos de la mazmorra.

Por el camino te encontrarás con diferentes trampas y puzzles que deberás solventar para continuar avanzando.

Diseminados por los distintos niveles de la mazmorra, encontrarás objetos que te será de mucha utilidad, armas, partes de armadura, pociones, hechizos, llaves...

En esta tercera parte de la trilogía, estamos ante un juego tipo RPG donde el jugador tendrá que poner en marcha todas su habilidades y lo aprendido en las anteriores entregas para completar con éxito su misión.

English Once Van Helsing had finished with Velnor the Sorcerer and after escaping from the castle, when he was about to take his carriage he found a girl waiting for him there. She, between sobs, explained that her mother, Alena, had been kidnapped and locked in a dark dungeon and that since she knew of his exploits against the hordes of evil that were ravaging Transylvania, she had decided to look for him to ask for help. In this new adventure, you embody Van Helsing again, but once you manage to rescue the prisoner, she will join you and then you will be able to use all her abilities. Finally, you will have to escape from the dungeon together.

Along the way you will find different traps and puzzles that you must solve to continue advancing.

Scattered throughout the different levels of the dungeon, you will find objects that will be very useful to you, weapons, armor parts, potions, spells, keys...

In this third part of the trilogy, we are facing an RPG-type game where the player will have to use all his skills and what he has learned in the previous installments to successfully complete his mission.
